title: Unveiling adsorption tendency of film-forming additives to enable fast-charging hard carbon anodes with regulated Li plating

Regulating lithium (Li) plating with high reversibility on hard carbon (HC) anode is a practical approach to breaking through the bottleneck of the fast-charging lithium-ion batteries (LIBs). However, the solid...
